description:
*NOTE: The `pagerduty_event_rule` resource has been deprecated in favor of the [pagerduty_ruleset](ruleset.html) and [pagerduty_ruleset_rule](ruleset_rule.html) resources. Please use the `ruleset` based resources for working with Event Rules.*


An [event rule](https://v2.developer.pagerduty.com/docs/global-event-rules-api) determines what happens to an event that is sent to PagerDuty by monitoring tools and other integrations.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

ActionJson.description: A list of one or more actions for each rule. Each action within the list is itself a list.

AdvancedConditionJson.description: Contains a list of specific conditions including `active-between`,`scheduled-weekly`, and `frequency-over`. The first element in the list is the label for the condition, followed by a list of values for the specific condition. For more details on these conditions see [Advanced Condition](https://v2.developer.pagerduty.com/docs/global-event-rules-api#section-advanced-condition) in the PagerDuty API documentation.

ConditionJson.description: Contains a list of conditions. The first field in the list is `and` or `or`, followed by a list of operators and values.
